mechanics: Trade Hubs auto-spawn caravans on valid routes.
Caravans earn more over distance and tariff auras.

Reduce pack/unpack time by 40%; Bazaar gains +200 HP while packed.
Trade Hubs spawn 2 uncontrollable escorts with each Caravan. Each active Caravan grants +2 population housing.
